DeviceFunction.Description: Indicates the current microphone connection status.

ReturnValue.Description: Returns an integer value that indicate the current telephone microphone connection status. Possible return values are: 0: PHN_VAG_DIAG_MIC_CONN_OPEN Open load is detected for Microphone connection.; 1: PHN_VAG_DIAG_MIC_CONN_SHORT Short to ground is detected for Microphone connection.; 2: PHN_VAG_DIAG_MIC_CONN_OK Microphone connection status is OK.; 255: PHN_VAG_DIAG_MIC_CONN_UNDEF Microphone connection status is undefined.
